mapper.sql: select c.* from ( select b.* from (select @rownum :=@rownum + 1 AS rm,a.* from (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, (
) a ) b where b.rm <= #{offset}) c where c.rm >= #{pageSize}
mapper.select:
SELECT CHAPTER_OFFICE
FROM chapter_tab group by CHAPTER_OFFICE

SELECT COURSE_TYPE_NAME
FROM chapter_tab where CHAPTER_OFFICE=#{chapterOffice} group by COURSE_TYPE_NAME

SELECT count(*)
FROM chapter_tab where CHAPTER_OFFICE=#{chapterOffice} group by COURSE_TYPE_NAME

SELECT PROFESSIONAL_NAME
FROM chapter_tab where CHAPTER_OFFICE=#{chapterOffice} and COURSE_TYPE_NAME=#{courseTypeName} group by PROFESSIONAL_NAME

SELECT count(*)
FROM chapter_tab where CHAPTER_OFFICE=#{chapterOffice} and COURSE_TYPE_NAME=#{courseTypeName} group by PROFESSIONAL_NAME

SELECT CHAPTER_CODE,CHAPTER_STATER,CHAPTER_ID,CHAPTER_NAME,PROFESSIONAL_TYPE_CODE,PROFESSIONAL_NAME,COURSE_TYPE_CODE,COURSE_NAME,CHAPTER_NAME_CODE,CLASSS_TIME,TRAINER,TRAINER_PHONE,CHAPTER_OFFICE,CHAPTER_DESCRIBE,TEST_WAY,OVER_TIME,POST_ID,UP_DATE,COURSE_TYPE_NAME
FROM chapter_tab
where CHAPTER_OFFICE like '%人事处%' and CHAPTER_STATER='已审核'
AND COURSE_TYPE_NAME = #{courseTypeName}
AND COURSE_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{courseName}), '%')
AND JURIS_TYPE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{jurisType}), '%')

SELECT count(*)
FROM chapter_tab
where CHAPTER_OFFICE like '%人事处%' and CHAPTER_STATER='已审核'
AND COURSE_TYPE_NAME = #{courseTypeName}
AND COURSE_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{courseName}), '%')
AND JURIS_TYPE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{jurisType}), '%')

where CHAPTER_OFFICE like '%办公室%' and CHAPTER_STATER='已审核'
AND COURSE_TYPE_NAME = #{courseTypeName}
AND COURSE_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{courseName}), '%')
AND JURIS_TYPE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{jurisType}), '%')

FROM chapter_tab where CHAPTER_OFFICE like '%信息中心%' and CHAPTER_STATER='已审核' group by COURSE_TYPE_NAME
